content: Give me a list of 12 words that have 'ght' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here are 12 words that contain the sequence "ght":

1. Light
2. Night
3. Thought
4. Right
5. Sight
6. Fought
7. Flight
8. Tight
9. Bright
10. Plight
11. Weight
12. Height

I hope this helps! If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
